name: Anarchist V.1
description:
After the world fell apart, two factions rose from the ashes. These two factions are the Anarchists, and the Ravenbeak. 

The Anarchists want for the new world to be government free.

The Ravenbeak want to seize complete control, and maintain power.

Obviously, the Anarchists want none of that... So what do they do? They bring out the big guns.

FEATURES:

- Play as 10 different heroes!

- Use 9 different weapons!

- Capture the Flag, and TDM game modes!

- Unique polygon style!

- Single and Multiplayer!

- 5 ability types!

- 4 perks!

- AND MORE!
